Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nagaritha Drive, north of a large corn field.
Room.LongDescription: The corn fields to the south supply the city of Oceancrest with all the corn it needs for both human and animal survival. The fields cover quite a few acres, and are protected by a tall fence. On the north there is a barn and a new silo being constructed to supplement the current one, which has already reached capacity. Oceancrest likes to keep extra food in storage in case of a prolonged attack from outside the city walls.
